snippet: New satellite imagery offers further signs that North Korea has restarted a nuclear reactor capable of producing plutonium for bombs, a United States research institute said.
abstract: United States research institute says new satellite imagery offers evidence that North Korea has restarted a nuclear reactor capable of producing plutonium for bombs.
lead_paragraph: New satellite imagery offers further signs that North Korea has restarted a nuclear reactor capable of producing plutonium for bombs, a United States research institute said.
